channel.title: Need Npc to kill Npc --Help
channel.description:
I've been searching on Google and I looked on here and I don't see a mere code or NPCHandler about "Npcs killing Npcs" and "Npcs killing players, except the "Owner" of the Server" which would actually be pretty cool. Also I want the "Npcs killing Npcs and certain players" to follow the owner. My client is a 317-508.
This effect of what the Npc killing Npc+Player does is this : Whenever they follow me, if they see a different Npc(besides them) they will chase it and kill it, even if it's a higher level or even if it could kill them in a few hits the Npc will try to attempt to kill it.
Now if anyone knows where to start tell me--- The only hint I know where to go is the "NPCHandler.java" it seems to be the best pick to do this, however the "Client.java" seems to be also a key to make this possible.
Also if I am wrong about nobody making a tutorial about this, send me a link right now. Again, my client is a 317-508.

item.title: Need Npc to kill Npc --Help
item.dc:creator: @DeJock DeJock
item.description:
@DeJock wrote:

Anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Npc to kill Npc --Help
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Possibly the answer might be in your server code, but maybe not. Most likely it is. (sarcasm)

Read full topic

item.title: Need Npc to kill Npc --Help
item.dc:creator: @DeJock DeJock
item.description:
@DeJock wrote:

Hmm, it has some 508 stuff but it’s more like a 317.
Most likely it’s a 317 with very little 508 in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Npc to kill Npc --Help
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Again, my client is a 317-508. What? Your client can’t both be a 317 and a 508. Do you mean it has the 508 anims?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Npc to kill Npc --Help
item.dc:creator: @DeJock DeJock
item.description:
@DeJock wrote:

I’ve been searching on Google and I looked on here and I don’t see a mere code or NPCHandler about “Npcs killing Npcs” and “Npcs killing players, except the “Owner” of the Server” which would actually be pretty cool. Also I want the “Npcs killing Npcs and certain players” to follow the owner. My client is a 317-508.

This effect of what the Npc killing Npc+Player does is this :
Whenever they follow me, if they see a different Npc(besides them) they will chase it and kill it, even if it’s a higher level or even if it could kill them in a few hits the Npc will try to attempt to kill it.

Now if anyone knows where to start tell me—
The only hint I know where to go is the “NPCHandler.java” it seems to be the best pick to do this, however the “Client.java” seems to be also a key to make this possible.

Also if I am wrong about nobody making a tutorial about this, send me a link right now.
Again, my client is a 317-508.

Read full topic
